# Compel Tongue (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Medium Spells|Medium 2]], [[2nd Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 2]], [[2nd Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a wooden block carved with a letter)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Black Markets, pg. 24

This spell functions as *[[Share Language (Spell)|share language]]*, granting a creature the ability to read, understand, and communicate to the best of its ability in any one language you know. For the spellâ€™s entire duration, the target can speak and write only in the language imparted, but its ability to understand other languages is unaffected.
